#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:19


import sys

def solve(xs, x):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(xs, x))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:54:39

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs.sort()
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1] 
    if x < x_max:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_min:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return abs(x_max - x_min)

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))

dist.sort()

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:51:47

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, X = map(int, input().split())
x = map(int, input().split())

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)
print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:53:10

import sys

def solve(xs, x):
    x_min = min(xs)
    x_max = max(xs)
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(xs, x))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 17:00:40

import sys

def solve(xs, x):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max += (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min -= (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(xs, x))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# coding: utf-8
# Your code here!
n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()
 
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if s[i] == t[i]:
        ans += 1
 
print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 17:05:54

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_max:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x) // 2
    elif x > x_min:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max) // 2
    return abs(x_max - x_min)

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:55:13

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs, reverse=True)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_max:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_min:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return abs(x_max - x_min)

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
N, X = map(int, input().split())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort(reverse=True)

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)
